sentences.sContent: This hair conditioner is excellent for revitalizing dry, lifeless hair.
sentences.sCn: 这种护发素对使干枯、无生气的头发重新焕发光彩非常有效。

remMethod.val: re(再， 又) + vital(有活力的) + ize → 使恢复生机

trans.tranCn: 使恢复生机， 使再生； 使更强壮
trans.tranOther: To revitalize something that has lost its activity or its health means to make it active or healthy again
